A

Account - class bank.Account.
This class manages details about a single bank account.
Account(int) - Constructor for class bank.Account
Constructor to set up the account with some default values

Constructor to set up the account with given information.

An exception class used at the time of adding a new account to the bank.
AccountExistsException(String) - Constructor for class bank.AccountExistsException
Constructor allowing to pass a message string along with the exception
addAccount(Account) - Method in class bank.Bank
Add a new account to the bank.

bank - package bank
 
Bank - class bank.Bank.
This class collects and manipulates a set of Accounts stored in an array.
Bank() - Constructor for class bank.Bank
Constructor to set up the bank with the default number of accounts

Constructor to set up the bank with the given number of accounts

N

NoMoreAccountsException - exception bank.NoMoreAccountsException.
An exception class used to notify that the array of accounts is full.
NoMoreAccountsException(String) - Constructor for class bank.NoMoreAccountsException
Constructor allowing to pass a message string along with the exception
NotFoundException - exception bank.NotFoundException.
An exception class used to notify of a failed attempt to find an account in the bank.
NotFoundException(String) - Constructor for class bank.NotFoundException
Constructor allowing to pass a message string along with the exception

O

OverdraftException - exception bank.OverdraftException.
An exception class used to notify of an attempt to exceed the overdraft limit on an account.
OverdraftException(String) - Constructor for class bank.OverdraftException
Constructor allowing to pass a message string along with the exception
